testcase.classname: Full Signup, Login, and Cleanup Flow
testcase.name: Verify navigation and product display for brand pages
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed And User navigates to "http://automationexercise.com".......................passed Then Home page should be visible successfully...............................passed And User clicks on "Products" button on BrandPage...........................passed Then Brands are visible on the left side bar................................passed When User clicks on any brand name..........................................passed Then User is navigated to brand page and brand products are displayed.......passed When User clicks on another brand name from the left side bar...............passed Then User is navigated to that brand page and relevant products are displayed.passed
